basicInfo.name: Knox
basicInfo.flavor: Knox obtained immense power after awakening his Sword of the Underworld. He is now known as the Imperator of Purgatory.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 14% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 1.name: Infernal Shield
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Allies
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Healing: Continuous Healing amount becomes 20% of the caster's HP.

Skill 2.name: Hell Strike
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack plus 19% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Effect Resist Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 35% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Chance: Death chance becomes 40%.

Passive.name: Knight of Hell
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Death Effect Probability Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 39% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 45% of Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - All Enemies
 - Adds Effect: 34% Effect Resist Reduction [Always Active]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 39% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: Kris's subordinate. Once he crossed swords with Kris, he became convinced that Kris was the only one worthy of the title of Knight of Light.

basicInfo.name: Knox
basicInfo.flavor: Fragments of Knox's past memories of craving for dark power empowered Knox to earn him the title of Hell Commander.

スキル強化効果

profile.story: Kris's subordinate. Once he crossed swords with Kris, he became convinced that Kris was the only one worthy of the title of Knight of Light.

basicInfo.name: Knox
basicInfo.flavor: Before turning into a Hell Knight, Knox was an honorable commander of Terra, famous throughout the lands for his swordsmanship.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 10% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Infernal Shield
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Allies
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack plus 16% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Effect Resist Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 30% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.
